title: We're conducting a research on small scale for our UG project? Need Your Help
selftext:
Hey guy's I'm a first year Student at NIT Jalandhar.
Me along with my fellow teammates are conducting a research for a project for which we've to write report as well.
If you can spare 2 minutes of your busy schedule to answer this quck survey we'll be highly obliged.
Thanks for your time.
https://forms.gle/xkAx1fyGPRDxW8Er6
